message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. However, that price is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay around $8,000 at this time.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $8,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
Hi Alice, I understand the value, but $17,000 is still more than I'm looking to spend. Would you consider $10,000? That's my final offer.
